rows.label: bf11550130_0003
rows.name: Metsu aims for the seal...?

rows.label: bf11550130_0004
rows.name: Yes. He draws ever closer to the capital.

rows.label: bf11550130_0005
rows.name: Leaving destruction in his wake.

rows.label: bf11550130_0007
rows.name:
Our path here was littered with
the wounds of his procession, my Lord.

rows.label: bf11550130_0009
rows.name: So the Deacon's report was true.

rows.label: bf11550130_0010
rows.name: Noble Hugo.

rows.label: bf11550130_0020
rows.name:
At this time of grave peril,
you have afforded us your trusty aid.

rows.label: bf11550130_0030
rows.name: Your due will be our eternal thanks.

rows.label: bf11550130_0040
rows.name: I'm scarcely worthy of it, Your Majesty.

rows.label: bf11550130_0050
rows.name:
As the Divine Beasts breathe, I merely 
followed Prince Adel against the peril we face.

rows.label: bf11550130_0060
rows.name: In truth, it is to him that your kind praise is due.

rows.label: bf11550130_0070
rows.name: Ah, the trust of the dread Superbian throne...

rows.label: bf11550130_0072
rows.name:
'Tis a much valued gift to our young scion
of Aletta. Mark it well.

rows.label: bf11550130_0080
rows.name: It gladdens me.

rows.label: bf11550130_0090
rows.name:
Your most noble honors pierce
my unworthy heart, my Lord.

rows.label: bf11550130_0100
rows.name:
Begging your pardon, Lord... Would that honor were
the only currency in this grave business.

rows.label: bf11550130_0110
rows.name:
An armed band transgressed the sacred
boundaries of the capital, without regal assent.

rows.label: bf11550130_0120
rows.name: The act merits bitter punishment!

rows.label: bf11550130_0130
rows.name: Suppose you that our soldiers can subdue Metsu alone?

rows.label: bf11550130_0132
rows.name: I...I don't...

rows.label: bf11550130_0134
rows.name: Indeed...

rows.label: bf11550130_0136
rows.name: The army of resistance fearlessly dashes to our nation's aid.

rows.label: bf11550130_0138
rows.name:
They tremble not in the face of the mightiest of foes.
To punish them is unthinkable.

rows.label: bf11550130_0140
rows.name: Yes...but...

rows.label: bf11550130_0150
rows.name: Zettar. What does not bend, only breaks.

rows.label: bf11550130_0160
rows.name: We must suffer to Adel his just bounty.

rows.label: bf11550130_0162
rows.name: I hereby enfeoff you, as Lord of Heblin.

rows.label: bf11550130_0170
rows.name: This is too much for me, my Lord.

rows.label: bf11550130_0180
rows.name:
First, I must busy myself with the command
of the resistance force.

rows.label: bf11550130_0190
rows.name: We can't allow Metsu to take the seal.

rows.label: bf11550130_0200
rows.name:
I'd be much obliged if you could grant permission for
the resistance to move freely within your lands, Lord.

rows.label: bf11550130_0210
rows.name:
As you wish
Brave soldiers of Iira! Hear your king!

rows.label: bf11550130_0220
rows.name:
Our country must make its own sacrifice
to halt the power of the Holy Grail!

rows.label: bf11550130_0230
rows.name: Acedia too, pledge its flesh and blood to the cause.

rows.label: bf11550130_0240
rows.name:
I humbly confess that it was my own lack of foresight
which brought us to this pass.

rows.label: bf11550130_0250
rows.name: My brother.

rows.label: bf11550130_0260
rows.name:
Or rather, my Lord. What is your aim?
Why give Heblin to Adel?

rows.label: bf11550130_0270
rows.name:
He has declined our offer.
Perhaps our good wishes suffice.

rows.label: bf11550130_0280
rows.name: Yet still, he holds all the power!

rows.label: bf11550130_0290
rows.name:
He makes allies of foreign lords without permission,
and gathers together a fighting force...

rows.label: bf11550130_0300
rows.name: [ML:undisp ]...

rows.label: bf11550130_0310
rows.name:
Zettar, my brother.
Hear me well.

rows.label: bf11550130_0320
rows.name:
This sickened world rests heavy upon my crown.
I fear, too heavy for my mortal neck.

rows.label: bf11550130_0330
rows.name: Ma-Majesty!

rows.label: bf11550130_0340
rows.name: And this disorderly throne...

rows.label: bf11550130_0350
rows.name: ...is more apt for one such as Adel.

rows.label: bf11550130_0360
rows.name:
Brother! You mean to set my birthright
on the caitiff's shoulders?!
